name: Call Centre Simulator
description:
You're working in a call centre and have to literally speak to an irate customer.  Listen to his concerns through your headphones and speak out loud to respond to him.  There will be two response options displayed on the screen, say one of them out loud to select it.  

This game was made over a short period of time, so there may be some lag between your voice input and the customer response.  If nothing seems to happen, try again or try the other one.  If nothing happens after that, the buttons are clickable so you can click a response.

For now, please enjoy it for what it is and PLEASE WEAR HEADPHONES :)

Other notes

Pressing escape will quit the game immediately.

This game can only run on Windows computers as it uses the Windows Speech to Text service,  sorry Mac users.  If you're on Windows 10 you might need to enable Microphone as well as Speech, Inking and Typing in the Privacy settings.

If you don't like raised or angry-sounding voices this may not be the game for you.
